resources.string: INFORMED CUSTOMER CONSENT FOR TEETH \n WHITENING TREATMENT

This app works best in a room not heavily lit. For best results, it might be helpful to dim your room lights so they don’t overpower the blue light from your phone during your 60 minute whitening session.
When finished, teeth should be completely visible. If you experience discomfort, try adding a very small amount of Vaseline on the side (of where) to make it more comfortable.
Inserting cheek retractor Slip the left side of the mouth onto the smooth round groove on one side of the cheek retractor.
Hold the cheek retractor in a vertical position with the semi-circle pointing toward the ground and the side that has the curved flanges toward the face.
Now slip the right side of the mouth onto the other side of the cheek retractor.
You’ll want to use a room where you can dim the lights. It is important you don’t drown out the blue light from your phone during the session.
